Text: Are there subtitles in this release?
Not all. But subs are available externally.

Hey! Thanks you so much for sharing. I have a suggestion though. Can you give one or two people your bandwidth in stead of everybody? Once they got it complete, they (hopefully) become seeders. That way the download speed would increase. At the moment it takes 400 days, i'm not joking. I've some 7MB/s upload speed available...

Hey!   Thanks you so much for this torrent! 
Though, I have a question about the 33 connected seeders. Actually one is seeding, 32 are just connected. Is there an option at my end which is wrong? At this moment it takes 320 days, really. 
Thanks again for this great torrent!

Thank you very much DownTYU & REPTiLE for one of the biggest torrent on TPB!
It took me 8 days to finish it (no, I don't have a dial-up connection, if you're wondering) and I've downloaded it with avg. 426.7 KB/s; meanwhile I've uploaded no less than 4.28 TB (a 15.6 ratio U/D). Why do I bother you with this statistic? Just to say that if you want to share, you can do it at least as me (and I don't think I have the best bandwidth); if I had 3-4 seeders that wouldn't strangled their upload speed, I would have had finished in 2-3 days (which I hope I helped others to do...). Thanks for sharing, brothers, but I think we can do much better...
